title: 1890's SGC Authentic Bill Clymer Cabinet Card
author: pencil1974

posts.post_title: 1890's SGC Authentic Bill Clymer Cabinet Card
posts.post_content:
Great looking cabinet card of Bill Clymer. Same photo that is used on his player reference page. Played very briefly for the 1891 Athletics then played and managed another 20 years in the minors. Has over 2000 wins as a minor league coach.

$275 PP gift delivered.

PM me if interested.
